scenario: In 2025, Evan has an Adjusted Gross Income (AGI) (or contribution base) of $60,334.66. Evan makes a charitable contribution of $29,454.38 in cash to a public charity. Under I.R.C. § 170(b)(1)(G)(i), the deduction is limited to 60% of the contribution base.
question: Calculate the allowable charitable deduction for 2025.
answer_explanation: The deduction is limited to 60% of AGI ($36,200.80). Since the contribution ($29,454.38) is compared to the limit, the allowable deduction is $29,454.38.
reasoning: Calculated limit and compared to contribution.
